summary: Diff shows new state/ref and an effect in SemesterDashboardView to auto-scroll a Student Data Sheet wrapper into view when selectedRollNumber changes. However, due to truncation, the diff summary does not provide enough direct evidence that clicking a roll number inside BacklogDistributionPanel (or selecting from the failed-students dropdown) actually sets selectedRollNumber and renders the StudentDataSheetPanel / Student Not Found panel accordingly.

missing_requirements.requirement: Clicking any roll number button inside Backlog Distribution shows the Student Data Sheet panel (or Student Not Found) for that roll number, and auto-scrolls it into the viewport; the failed-students dropdown selection continues to work and also scrolls the panel into view.
missing_requirements.reason: Auto-scroll-on-selection is implemented (useEffect on selectedRollNumber), but the diff snippet is truncated before showing the actual render of StudentDataSheetPanel, any Student Not Found panel, and the wiring from BacklogDistributionPanel roll-number clicks and the failed-students dropdown to setSelectedRollNumber. Therefore the core interaction requirements cannot be confirmed from the provided diff evidence.
evidence: frontend/src/features/dashboard/SemesterDashboardView.tsx (truncated; shows auto-scroll effect but not the click wiring/rendering for the panel)

hallucinated_features.description: Project state tracking entries (AR-1, AR-2) added/updated in project_state.json
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask to add or modify any project tracking/state files; only a frontend behavior change is requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Large update to frontend-file-summaries.txt describing many unrelated features (Excel parser changes, charts, styling, dependencies, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to auto-show/scroll the Student Data Sheet when selecting a roll number in Backlog Distribution (and keep dropdown behavior). Updating a broad project summary file with unrelated feature descriptions was not requested.
